items.title: Why Paradigm built a spreadsheet with an AI agent in every cell
items.description: Paradigm raised a $5 million seed round and is releasing it's AI-powered spreadsheet to the general public.

items.title: Linktree goes dark in India — and the company isn’t sure why
items.description: Linktree is "investigating" an issue that has made its link-in-bio platform inaccessible in India for several days.
